skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Alexa to voice control your Masterplug products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our "MP SmartEnergy" app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in "MP SmartEnergy" app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable "MP SmartEnergy" skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say "Search complete";
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, Turn on [device name]
Alexa, Turn off [device name]
Alexa, Power on [device name]
Alexa, Power off [device name]
Alexa, Set [device name] temperature to [X] degrees
Alexa, Increase [device name] temperature by [X] degrees
Alexa, Decrease [device name] temperature by [X] degrees
Alexa, What’s [device name] current temperature?
Alexa, Set the heater to fan mode
Alexa, Set the heater to low mode
Alexa, Set the heater to high mode
Alexa, Set the heater to frost protection mode
Alexa, Switch to automatic mode
Alexa, Set a timer for [X] hours for [device name]?
Alexa, Turn off [device name] in [X] hours
Alexa, Cancel timer for [device name]
Alexa, How much time is left on the timer for [device name]?
Alexa, Start the [device name] every day at [X] AM/PM
Alexa, Stop the [device name] at [X] AM/PM
Alexa, How much energy has the [device name] used today?
